article_metadata.news-keywords: Charles, van, der, Horst, UNC, Chapel Hill, hospital, doctor, NC, North Carolina, Liberia, Republican, Medicaid
article_metadata.description: Charles van der Horst: There is one difference between North Carolina and Liberia. In Liberia, the government and agencies such as Last Mile Health are trying to take basic health care to all citizens. In North Carolina, our leaders are working actively to decrease access to health care for the poor and working poor.
article_metadata.title: A death in Liberia, disgrace in N.C. | News & Observer
